_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The three defilements [mn9:71.4]: The defilement of desire to be reborn
The qualities of a noble disciple [mn9:7: Understanding choices, their origin, their cessation, and the practice that leads to their cessation
Understanding ignorance, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation
Understanding defilement, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation
Having experiential confidence in the teaching
Having come to the true teaching
